body_html:
Thank you all so much for the information. There is no regression, it just seemed slower than I would have guessed from experience in other frameworks. No cross library benchmarks were done.

As for the benchmark, the python version is indeed the fastest on the workloads I care about (CNN).

If I get a free moment I will look into a faster kernel and check performance myself.

body:
Thank you all so much for the information. There is no regression, it just seemed slower than I would have guessed from experience in other frameworks. No cross library benchmarks were done.

As for the benchmark, the python version is indeed the fastest on the workloads I care about (CNN).

If I get a free moment I will look into a faster kernel and check performance myself.
